column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I've been here a few times now
column2: and every single time it has been absolutely fantastic. There is literally nothing to complain about with this place
column6: just god damn this place rocks. Are you looking for a top 3
column7: maybe top 2 steak in Chicago? Hit up Bavette's
column8: and even if you don't want steak
column9: their food selection is phenomenal and overall all great quality!
